why_it_works: Background is the hero - blur reveals designed contrast zones
Top/bottom value transition creates depth through glass
Organic blob shapes feel alive vs geometric
stealable_rules: Glass needs designed contrast zones: dark top, bright bottom, diagonal tension
Blobs need internal value (radial gradients), not flat fills
Tint the glass with overlay gradient for mood
At least one blob should intersect card edge for gradient seam
Typography: label light (300) but higher opacity = delicate not weak
